content: to celebrate this year s chinese new year 2024 for the year of the dragon 10th february 2024 28th january 2025 this design brings to crochet form the paper dragon the pattern is written in us terminology and is worked in continuous rounds unless otherwise stated approximate size of the chinese paper dragon is 4cm 1½inches tall by 24cm 9½inches in length this crochet pattern is for personal use only please do not redistribute or resell it in any form tools 3 5mm hook scissors tapestry needle stitch marker 5mm safety eyes x2 toy stuffing red yarn - head/ears/snout-top/snout-bottom/tail orange yarn - side gills/moustache yellow yarn - horns/eyebrows/tail mixed yarn red/orange/yellow - body pink yarn - cheeks bamboo skewers x2 glue
